message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $100. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider that?

I understand you're still a bit above $100, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $102. It's getting close to the minimum I'm willing to accept, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle again, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $99. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.

I'm surprised you're not willing to meet me at $105, Bob. I'm not willing to go as low as $99 either. I'm willing to make one more concession, but that's as low as I'll go. I can offer it to you for $106. This is my final offer.
